""ROUND 1: TYPE HYPE

One participant from the team will be given a time duration of 2 minutes to type a page of 150 words. However the screen will not be displayed, and the participant will not be able to see what he/she types during the 2 minute challenge. The points awarded will be based only on the degree of accuracy.

In case of a tie after 4 rounds, the team that completed this round faster will be declared the winner.

ROUND 2: TRAILBLAZER

The participants will be shown a web page from which they have to navigate to the destination web page specified without using anything other than the mouse, within a specified time limit. Marks will be awarded only if they reach the destination web page within the allotted time of 5 minutes.
There will be no option to return to the previous page. The participants will have to restart to do that.

ROUND 3: QUICK CONNECT

 The participants will be given 4 envelopes, each containing a picture. To open an envelope, a participant will have to solve the question given outside the envelope. Once they get the right answer, they are allowed to open the envelope, which contains a picture. When all 4 envelopes are opened, the participants can guess the connection between the pictures.

In case any envelope is unopened, the participant can request for the answer to unlock the envelope, at the cost of -5 points.

 A proper fully correct answer (the connection between the four pictures) will be rewarded 30 points. 
 
The time allotted to complete the whole round is 6 minutes.

ROUND 4: THE BRAINIAC

Each team will be allotted a maximum of 7 minutes to solve a crime. The case files with the required evidence will be given to the participants. The participants will have to read this and find the criminal. The participants will be required to give the right answer along with a proper reason to justify their answer (to avoid random guesswork).

Registration should be individual."
